body_html: That's a lot of filenames! Perhaps you could write them to an index file, one filename per line, and use TextLineDataset(index_filename).flat_map(lambda filename: ...) where ... is the appropriate reading and parsing logic for a single file.
body_text: That's a lot of filenames! Perhaps you could write them to an index file, one filename per line, and use TextLineDataset(index_filename).flat_map(lambda filename: ...) where ... is the appropriate reading and parsing logic for a single file.
body: That's a lot of filenames! Perhaps you could write them to an index file, one filename per line, and use `TextLineDataset(index_filename).flat_map(lambda filename: ...)` where `...` is the appropriate reading and parsing logic for a single file.
